subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Discreet Cat stretched his unbeaten streak to six races by winning the $300,000 Cigar Mile at Aqueduct yesterday by three and a quarter lengths. The jockey Garrett Gomez and Discreet Cat cleared the field an eighth of a mile from the finish line.
snippet: Discreet Cat stretched his unbeaten streak to six races by winning the $300,000 Cigar Mile at Aqueduct yesterday by three and a quarter lengths. The jockey Garrett Gomez and Discreet Cat cleared the field an eighth of a mile from the finish line.
